bilingual.source: For her discovery of mobile genetic elements
bilingual.target: 发现可移动的遗传元素

bilingual.source: Do you want a table top system or mobile system?
bilingual.target: 需要的是台式机器还是可移动的麻醉机?

bilingual.source: That's a huge power-generating capability, a mobile power-generating capability.
bilingual.target: 所以由此可看出汽车发电能力的强大，而且还是可移动的发电。

bilingual.source: Now, this part is critical. The entire mammalian lung is mobile.
bilingual.target: 这一步很关键。哺乳类动物的整个肺是可移动的。

bilingual.source: Mobile walls that allows different ways to divide the spaces, creating versatility.
bilingual.target: 可移动的内隔墙方便了室内空间的自由分隔，使空间使用功能灵活多变。

bilingual.source: Supporting most of the internal combustion engine self-priming pump, mounted on a Mobile small car, suitable for field work.
bilingual.target: 自吸泵大部分与内燃机配套，装在可移动的小车上，宜于野外作业。

bilingual.source: A mobile lifting device comprises a dismantlable frame mounted on wheels and supporting an elevated horizontal beam which projects out beyond the perimeter of the frame.
bilingual.target: 一种可移动的提升装置包括一个安装在轮上的可拆卸的框架，它支撑伸在框架外的一个提升的水平梁。

bilingual.source: By then, many of the woks will have been removed, replaced by mobile ovens and griddles, and a weeklong soft opening will be staged at the end of the month to address any problems.
bilingual.target: 到时，很多炒菜锅会被搬走，代之为可移动的烤箱和浅锅。为时一周的软件开幕式将会在这个月的月底举行，以此探讨所有问题。

list.abstract: “mobile”一词我们最常见的中文翻译就是“手机”了，其实这并不是书面翻译，因为“手机”不是书面语，可以说手机是我们国人给起的外号吧。我们常说的“手机”的书面语是“移动电话”，英文是mobile telephone，因为mobile一词在没有来到中国之前是很少用到的。mobile是和telephone在一块才被人所了解的，另外mobile一般会用在网址上，经常可以用在手机商家、移动互联网公司，所以mobile就成了移动电话，手机最常用的简化名字了。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that noise? Daddy Pig's mobile phone is ringing. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么声音啊？猪爸爸的手机响了！什么？

yingyinNormal.en: If you didn't wanna get me on my mobile, then don't call me on my mobile.
yingyinNormal.zh: “如果—如果你不想跟我在手机上说，那就别给我手机打电话！”

yingyinNormal.en: You know what Amanda said when she got me on the phone? Oh, so sorry to catch you on your mobile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道阿蔓达跟我是在电话上是怎么说的？“哦，很抱歉打你的手机！”

yingyinNormal.en: Grandpa Pig, have you got your mobile phone? Yes, Granny Pig. Don't drop it in the water. No, Granny Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爷爷，你有没有带你的手机呀？我带来了，猪奶奶。小心不要掉进水里啊。不会的，猪奶奶。

yingyinNormal.en: At night, George likes to listen to his space mobile. No space again, it's boring. Space isn't boring, it is full of stars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚上，乔治喜欢听他床铃的太空音乐。怎么又是和太空有关，真是太无聊了。太空可一点都不无聊，到处都是星星。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you gave her a clown vest, and a three-wheeled joke-mobile, and two days to solve a case you guys haven't cracked in two weeks?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你给她一件小丑背心和一辆可笑的三轮车，给她两天时间，让她破你们两周都没破的案子？

yingyinNormal.en: See, I got ideas. I got thoughts. Like this. I call it a "mobile home." Isn't that something? And I'm calling this one a "lifterator."
yingyinNormal.zh: 看，我有想法我有思想，像这个 我把它叫作"移动房屋"这不算有点厉害吗? 我把这家伙叫作"升降机"

yingyinNormal.en: Through developing mobile payment, we can now use apps to pay in nearly all the situations, even to make an appointment with the doctors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过不断发展的移动支付方式，我们现在能用手机应用软件在几乎任何情境下支付，甚至能预约医生。

yingyinNormal.en: This issue is too sensitive for a mobile White House. I need to be in the Situation Room with my entire staff and team of advisors around me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个问题太敏感，不能在外解决我需要在战况室里与行政人员和顾问团队一起讨论。

yingyinNormal.en: I am a mobile virtual presence device. Recent events have demonstrated to me that my body is too fragile to endure the vicissitudes of the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是一个移动虚拟化身设备，鉴于近来发生的事，我意识到我的肉身太过脆弱，承受不了大千世界的种种。

yingyinNormal.en: Since it was just me and Mama and we had all these empty rooms, Mama decided to let those rooms out, mostly to people passing through, like from, Mobile, Montgomery, places like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 房子只有我和妈妈住，我们有好多空房间，妈妈将这些空房出租给路过的人住，比如从莫比镇、或蒙哥马利镇来的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 移动能力；灵活性；流动性；机动性；流动
v. 动员；使可移动；动用；利用；鼓动；使流动

word_family.mean: adj. 移动的；移动式的；易移动的；活动的；与移动电话有关的；流动性强的；愿意流动的

examination_example.sentence: Radesky has studied the use of <highlight>mobile</highlight> phones and tablets at mealtimes by giving mother – child pairs a food-testing exercise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Radesky通过对母子组合进行食物测试，来研究用餐时手机和平板电脑的使用情况。

examination_example.sentence: Prohibit suspects from using their <highlight>mobile</highlight> phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 禁止嫌疑人使用手机。

examination_example.sentence: The Supreme Court will now consider whether police can search the contents of a <highlight>mobile</highlight> phone without a warrant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院现在将考虑，警方是否可以在没有搜查令的情况下搜查手机内容。

sense_info_list.en: able to move or be moved freely or easily

examination_example.sentence: Microsoft bought task management app Wunderlist and <highlight>mobile</highlight> calendar Sunrise in 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 微软在2015年收购了任务管理应用程序奇妙清单和移动日历日出。

examination_example.sentence: And though print ad sales still dwarf their online and <highlight>mobile</highlight> counterparts, revenue from print is still declining.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管印刷广告的销量仍然远远超过在线和移动广告，但印刷广告的收入仍在下降。

sense_info_list.en: relating to mobile phones, handheld computers, and similar technology

word_usage.usage: mobile作形容词，表示“非固定的；移动的”时，常用于名词之前，修饰该名词，如：mobile equipment；表示“腿脚方便的”时，一般不用于名词之前，而是用于系动词之后，如：The elderly may be less mobile. 老年人可能行动不便。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 移动能力；灵活性；流动性；机动性；流动
v. 动员；使可移动；动用；利用；鼓动；使流动

word_family.mean: adj. 移动的；移动式的；易移动的；活动的；与移动电话有关的；流动性强的；愿意流动的

sense_info_list.en: able to move or be moved freely or easily
sense_info_list.zh: 可移动的; 能移动的(人/物)

examination_example.sentence: Marconi invented the idea of global communication—or, more straightforwardly, globally networked, <highlight>mobile</highlight>, wireless communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi发明了全球通信的概念，或者更直接地说，全球网络化、移动、无线通信。

examination_example.sentence: Marconi was really interested in only one thing: the extension of <highlight>mobile</highlight>, personal, long­-distance communication to the ends of the earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi真正感兴趣的只有一件事：把移动的、个人的、长距离的通信延伸到地球的两端。

examination_example.sentence: The telegraph, the telephone, and radio were the obvious predecessors of the Internet, iPods, and <highlight>mobile</highlight> phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电报、电话和收音机显然是互联网、ipod和移动电话的前身。

examination_example.sentence: Often the advantages of convenient, <highlight>mobile</highlight> technology are both obvious and taken for granted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常便捷移动技术的优点是显而易见的并且理所当然的。

sense_info_list.en: relating to mobile phones, handheld computers, and similar technology
sense_info_list.zh: 移动电话的; 手机的

examination_example.sentence: On Jan. 9, 2007, Steve Jobs formally announced Apple's "revolutionary <highlight>mobile</highlight> phone".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2007年1月9日，Steve Jobs 正式发布了苹果的“革命性手机”。

word_family.mean: adj. 移动的；移动式的；易移动的；活动的；与移动电话有关的；流动性强的；愿意流动的

sense_info_list.en: relating to mobile phones; handheld computers; and similar technology
sense_info_list.zh: 移动电话的; 手机的

examination_example.sentence: We get connected with each other via Internet, shop online with <highlight>mobile</highlight> phones, and enjoy self-service on machines in banks and restaurants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们通过互联网相互联系，用手机在线购物，在银行和餐馆的机器上享受自助服务。

examination_example.sentence: Bring more <highlight>mobile</highlight> phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多带些手机。

examination_example.sentence: Drivers should make sure they're prepared for their journey with warm clothing, food and drink, sufficient fuel and a charged <highlight>mobile</highlight> phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 司机们应该确保他们已经为旅途做好准备，准备好保暖的衣服、食物和饮料、充足的燃料和充了电的手机。

sense_info_list.en: able to move or be moved freely or easily
sense_info_list.zh: 可移动的; 能移动的(人/物)

examination_example.sentence: For example, <highlight>mobile</highlight> robots have been programmed to keep a comfortable distance from humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，移动机器人已经被编程为与人类保持舒适的距离。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: relating to mobile phones, handheld computers, and similar technology
sense_info_list.zh: 移动电话的; 手机的

examination_example.sentence: These days you'd be hard pressed to find anyone in Australia over the age of 15 who doesn't own a <highlight>mobile</highlight> phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，你很难在澳大利亚找到15岁以上但没有手机的人。

examination_example.sentence: Providing a <highlight>mobile</highlight> phone for every family member.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为每个家庭成员提供一部手机。

examination_example.sentence: Desktop computers, basic <highlight>mobile</highlight> phones, and box-set TVs defined 1992.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 台式电脑、基本的移动电话和盒式电视定义了1992年。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 可移动的; 非固定的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 可移动的; 非固定的

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>mobile</highlight> phone with 5G can send videos much faster than the one with 4G.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5G手机发送视频的速度比4G手机快得多。

examination_example.sentence: I can’t find my <highlight>mobile</highlight> phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我找不到我的手机。

examination_example.sentence: Because of playing <highlight>mobile</highlight> phones, more people become silent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为玩手机，更多的人变得沉默。

examination_example.sentence: Our school has put up a sign at the gate, saying “Greet your child with a smile, not a <highlight>mobile</highlight>”.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们学校在大门口立了一块牌子，上面写着“用微笑迎接孩子，不要用手机”。

examination_example.sentence: Once a dish comes, instead of lifting our chopsticks, we take out our <highlight>mobiles</highlight> and click.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦有菜来了，我们不再举起筷子，而是拿出手机点击。

examination_example.sentence: We just cannot leave our <highlight>mobiles</highlight> for simply a meal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不能只为了一顿饭而离开手机。
